page.title: 08Ardross: amenities
page.content:
(1)Post Office (cont.) from/ Alness to Kildermorie then to the Post Office. The present fare is 84p return, to take people to Alness and back.
(2)Church Ardross church is situated at the front of Ardross village: it was built in 1899 and the first Bible was brought into the church on 12th. July 1900. An extension was built to the original church in 1941. It was an active church up to 1973 when it had to be closed down due to the poor state of repair and the cold.
